Topic: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately depict a range of plants and animals in different habitats, such as a forest, pond, or garden, showing diversity.
The student can illustrate detailed observations of habitat characteristics, including trees, water sources, and other environmental features.
The student can accurately compare and contrast living things across multiple habitats, clearly showing differences and similarities in their drawings.
The student can demonstrate patterns of diversity by organizing the drawings to reflect how varied environments support different life forms.
CANNOT: The student may occasionally mislabel a plant or animal, though this does not significantly affect overall understanding (minor gap in labeling consistency).
